title: Police continue to investigate accidental shooting
content:
The Putnam County sheriff's office continues to look into an accidental shooting that left a teen dead.
The sheriff's office says 17 year old Kyle Markins of Findlay was killed by a gun shot wound at 13915 County Road 3. He and 2 other friends were visiting a friend that lived in the home. The sheriff's office reports Markins was shooting with friends when he was fatally wounded. Markins was the only person injured.
Investigators are treating the incident as an accidental shooting but are continuing to investigate the case.
